_rawTooltip.fullTooltip: Innate - Hextech Shrapnel Shells: Corki's basic attacks are modified to deal [[0]] and [[1]].
Corki lobs a bomb, dealing [[0]]. The area and champions hit are revealed for 6 seconds.

Corki flies over and scorches a path, burning it for 2.5 seconds. Enemies in the fire take [[0]] per second.

If Corki has [[1]], he instead consumes it to fly a much greater distance, refresh this Ability's Cooldown, [[2]] enemies hit, and burn the path for 5 seconds. Enemies hit and in the path are [[3]] by 90% and take [[4]] per second for 2 seconds.

Corki fires a gatling gun in front of him, dealing [[0]] over 4 seconds and shredding up to [[1]] and [[2]].

The shred lingers for 2 seconds after being hit.

Corki fires a missile that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing [[0]] to surrounding enemies. Every third missile instead deals [[1]].

This Ability has 4 charges. Basic attacks against champions reduce the time between charges by 2 - 4 (based on critical strike chance) seconds.

Change.After: Re-timed Corki's basic attacks to launch the attack at a more appropriate frame of his attack animation. Basic attacks come out slightly more slowly.

Change.After: Re-timed the animation to fire at a more appropriate point in the animation. 0.25s cast time unchanged.
Now more consistently deals all its damage ticks. This is usually 10% more damage if your target was in the zone the whole time.
Damage over time now lingers for 1 second after leaving the zone
Can no longer deal more than the maximum damage if a target runs alongside Valkyrie's damaging zone
Particle effects have been scaled up to match the damage radius
Damage particles have been made less spammy
